betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oWireless connectors are a lower-scale version of the quantum bridge. 

They have a very high energy cost, growing quadratically with distance. They will not work across dimensions.

Only one network requires power for both to function.

Use the setup kit to link two connectors together.

§7§oThanks to Fox and StaffiX for the help!
